Class ImageViewArrayAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Picture>
        • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Inventory.Trinket.Pictures.ImageViewArrayAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class ImageViewArrayAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Picture>
    This class provides an ArrayAdapter that can work with pictures.

      • ImageViewArrayAdapter

        public ImageViewArrayAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                     int resource,
                     java.util.List<Picture> objects,
                     java.lang.Boolean showSizes)
        Returns a new ImageViewArrayAdapter used to display images.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        resource - The resource ID for a layout file containing a View to use when instantiating views.
        objects - The objects to represent in the ListView.
        showSizes - Whether or not the sizes of the images should be shown alongside the images.
